original_text:
“Do not keep talking so proudly
    or let your mouth speak such arrogance,
for the Lord is a God who knows,
    and by him deeds are weighed.
korean_text: 심히 교만한 말을 다시 하지 말 것이며 오만한 말을 너희의 입에서 내지 말지어다 여호와는 지식의 하나님이시라 행동을 달아 보시느니라

sentences.original_text: Do not keep talking so proudly
or let your mouth speak such arrogance
sentences.korean_translation: 또 네 입이 그런 오만한 말을 하게 하지 말라

sentences.original_text: for the Lord is a God who knows
and by him deeds are weighed
